column6: Dr. Doom has taken Rhodey and Pepper hostage and has given Iron Man an ultimatum: hand over the weapon capable of destroying the Fantastic Four or his friends die! To rescue them, Tony must utilize his Stealth Armor to infiltrate Castle Von Doom!
column8: | colorist:Marte Gracia | penciller:Graham Nolan | letterer:Dave Sharpe | writer:Fred Van Lente | penciller (cover):Skottie Young
